Posts.Content: StayinAlive68 wrote: I will be seeing the oncologist next week for the full diagnosis/prognosis.  They have been trying to do the HER2 test.  The other two tests were good, but the lab keeps saying there is not enough tissue to test.  They have tried the FISH test twice as well.  Sent to another lab last week for test# 4 and he says it LOOKS neg. to him and that he agrees, not enough to test.  Good but still not definitive. I am debating on a double mastectomy.  Trying to educate myself on options and pro/cons. What a nightmare this has been. Dx 3/8/2012, DCIS, <1cm, Grade 1, 0/0 nodes Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Just diagnosed with BC. AIDS for 20+yrs. StayinAlive68 Shachar
